wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Edward Coke, 8th Earl of Leicester (born 6 July 1965), is the son of Edward Coke, 7th Earl of Leicester, and Valeria Phyllis Potter. He is the current Earl of Leicester. From 1994 to 2015, when he succeeded into the earldom, he was styled Viscount Coke.

link_mentions.page: List of earls in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: * Thomas Coke, 8th Earl of Leicester (born 1965), British peer
